message: I'd love to get a comprehensive, well-vetted list going of helpful iOS 3rd party tools and libraries, I'll start it off with these by @myell0w - MTLocateMeBarButtonItem: https://github.com/myell0w/MTLocateMeBarButtonItem , MTStatusBarOverlay https://github.com/myell0w/MTStatusBarOverlay , and TISwipeableTableView  https://github.com/myell0w/TISwipeableTableView

This is a great one that I have yet to use but want to in the near future: Tweetie-like swipeable UITableViewCell which reveals hidden functionality. More of a code example but still cool. https://github.com/thermogl/TISwipeableTableView
My good buddy @samsoffes created SSToolkit, and it has a fantastic set of all kinds of wonderful classes, controls and categories: https://github.com/samsoffes/sstoolkit
@drewmckinney Nice, I can't wait to try that one out.
Check out these two topics: https://convore.com/ios-developers/useful-third-party-frameworkslibraries/ and https://convore.com/ios-developers/other-useful-resources/
Sensible TableView is one of the best iOS frameworks I've seen out there. http://www.senisblecocoa.com
I've created a site that organizes iOS Frameworks. Check it out at http://iosframeworks.com
